title: Actor Kerr Smith - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/23/18
itunes:title: Actor Kerr Smith - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/23/18
description:
Guest host Jimmy Church and actor Kerr Smith, best known for his roles on TV shows "Dawson's Creek" and "Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D." discuss his interest in the field of UFOs, and how Hollywood science fiction movies may expose the truth about aliens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
